name: SCRAM (itch) (scramdad)
description:
Scram is a completely FREE TO PLAY, award winning, multiplayer shooter with a ton of awesome mechanics and a large scale fanbase.

Fight as a peasant by shooting down mutants who are trying to kill you and wait for rescue in order evacuate the town. If you are a mutant, hunt down every peasant in order to prevent them from escaping.

Come join us in our Discord community: https://discord.gg/jp6fG9CqYX
